title: Europe's Migrant Crisis Spreads Ashore As Refugees Enter Bulgaria On Foot
teaser: Migrants from Syria and other nations are fleeing to Europe not just by sea but also over land via Turkey. In Bulgaria, one of the European Union's poorest nations, about 1,000 people used to cross the border in a year. Last weekend alone, 650 people tried to cross, most of them unsuccessfully.A version of this story originally aired on All Things Considered on June 17, 2015.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
